mapper.select: SELECT b.code code, c.`code` ccode, c.brand brand, c.model model, c.version version, c.displacement displacement, c.price price, c.apaylock apaylock, c.trimprice trimprice, c.num num, c.totalprice totalprice, c.id id FROM `jnd_contract` c LEFT JOIN jnd_buy b ON c.buyid = b.id where c.apayid=#{id};
SELECT count(*) FROM `jnd_contract` c LEFT JOIN jnd_buy b ON c.buyid = b.id where c.apayid=#{id};

SELECT b.code code, c.code ccode, c.brand brand, c.model model, c.version version, c.displacement displacement, c.price price, c.trimprice trimprice, c.paytype paytype, c.id id, c.num num, c.totalprice totalprice FROM `jnd_contract` c LEFT JOIN jnd_buy b ON c.buyid = b.id where c.buyid=#{buyid} and c.paytype=#{paytype} and c.apaylock is null and c.`status`=7 AND c.stamp=1
and c.selfbuy = #{selfbuy}

SELECT b.code code, c.code ccode, c.brand brand, c.model model, c.version version, c.displacement displacement, c.price price, c.trimprice trimprice, c.paytype paytype, c.totalprice totalprice, c.downpay downpay, c.finalpay finalpay, c.autotprice autotprice, c.currency currency, c.id id, c.num num FROM `jnd_contract` c LEFT JOIN jnd_buy b ON c.buyid = b.id where c.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update jnd_contract set apayid=NULL,apaylock=NULL where apayid=#{apayid}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM `jnd_contract` a JOIN jnd_buy b ON a.buyid = b.id join jnd_need c on c.id=b.needid WHERE 1=1
and (a.`status` is null or a.`status` in (1,2,3))
and a.`status` in (1,4,5,6)
and a.`status` in (4,7,8,9)
and b.`code` like concat('%',#{pcode},'%')
and b.`name` like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and a.`code` like concat('%',#{code},'%')
and a.brand like concat('%',#{brand},'%')
and a.`status` = #{status}
and a.country = #{country}
and DATE_FORMAT(a.`createtime`,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{createtime}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(num),0) FROM jnd_contract WHERE nopass IS NULL AND subbuyid=#{subbuyid}
and id!=#{id}

mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.`code` purchaseCode, b.`name` purchaseName FROM `jnd_contract` a JOIN jnd_buy b ON a.buyid = b.id and a.id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
